content:
EXISTING STRUCTURES
• No new structures have been successfully created during these steps. 
• Multiple attempts were made to supply a Lab (intended for receiving Automation Science Packs to support research) at Position(x=0.5, y=2.5), but none succeeded due to crafting, resource, and placement errors.
• Although the agent interacted with smelting furnaces (an iron furnace at Position(x=5.0, y=5.0) and a copper furnace at Position(x=-27.0, y=-60.0)) for resource processing, these were pre‐existing entities and are not counted as newly created structures.

ERROR TIPS
• API Parameter Issues with get_entities:
 – Avoid using unexpected keywords (e.g. “radius”) or an incorrect number of positional arguments. Verify the correct function signature before invocation.
• Null Reference Handling:
 – Ensure that the result from get_entities is validated (using an empty list as fallback) before iterating, to prevent errors from a None value.
• Lab Crafting Failures:
 – Confirm that all required sub-ingredients (such as iron-gear-wheels, copper-cables, and electronic-circuits) are available and craftable before attempting to craft a Lab.
 – Check resource availability and the dependency chain to prevent repeated crafting errors.
• Placement Errors:
 – Verify that the Lab is present in the inventory prior to placement to avoid errors when attempting to place a structure.
